responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "D75EBF6D47D993C8C631A3806F826AFA", "The Commander wants all units to proceed with great caution. We continue our surveillance efforts, but the hope is to avoid their detection for as long as possible. It won\'t be easy to maintain the illusion, but for all intents and purposes, the Forsaken Blade aren\'t colluding with the Sighted. This includes civilians. We all have a part to play in the upcoming battle.")
name: CSQ_RVR_0081_FB_NordenResnik_DLG_104_Response
